intro_gallery.title: ANSWER YOUR BODY’S NEEDS
intro_gallery.description: The way ingredients are sourced affects the way we nourish our bodies. Author Mark Schatzer believes our body naturally devolops an appetite for the foods and nutrients it needs to be healthy, but that artificial flavourings are getting in the way. This can be reversed by focusing on high-quality ingredients and being mindful as your appetite guides you to consume according to your body’s needs.
intro_gallery.highlight_description: Sourcing local or organic food is a good way to start being more mindful about what you're cooking and eating.

cards.title: Summer Lunch Menu By Mark Best

cards.title: Taking Taste Further
cards.description: This exclusive cookbook gives you all the know-how you need. We’ve designed it to make sure you get the most out of our products - and the best out of your food.
